original_text: Moses had already chosen Nun's son, Joshua, to take his place as the leader of the Israelites. So the Lord had filled Joshua with wisdom. The Israelites listened to Joshua. They obeyed the commands that the Lord had given to Moses.
korean_text: 모세가 눈의 아들 여호수아에게 안수하였으므로 그에게 지혜의 영이 충만하니 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 여호수아의 말을 순종하였더라

sentences.original_text: Moses had already chosen Nun's son, Joshua
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 이미 눈의 아들 여호수아를 선택했었다

sentences.original_text: to take his place as the leader of the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들의 지도자로서 그의 자리를 대신할

sentences.original_text: So the Lord had filled Joshua with wisdom
that the Lord had given to Moses
